name: The Mondrianish Glitch
description: Marjan’s critically acclaimed Digital Bodies have defined an original, influential, and unique aesthetic for Post Humanism in Digital Art. Through her iconic #GlitchGoddess series as viral internet hits, popular collected NFTs, gallery/museum exhibitions, and international public art commissions, she has created a contemporary style of figuration that is ever morphing, in flux, glitched, gestural, liminal, and informed by art and animation history, cinema, digital culture, and memes. For her Genesis Tezos piece, Marjan has extended her figural vocabulary to a male body in an infinite loop walk with what she calls a Mondrianish Glitch, exploring the juxtaposition of the rectangular with the organic forms in a #digitalbody.
